comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: George McAneny (1869-1953): diglib.princeton.edu/ead/getEad?eadid=MC091&kw= Judge John William Goff (1848-1924), Irish-born American lawyer and judge: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Goff

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
At a June 2, 1914,  ceremony at Columbia University's School of Journalism during Commencement Week, where they witnessed the unveiling of Partridge's statue of Thomas Jefferson, presented to the University by New York publisher Ralph Pulitzer. McAneny was one of the speakers on that occasion.

Other Bain/LOC photos of the unveiling ceremony:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5497263168/in/photostream/]
